skills.name: Obliterate (木っ端微塵)
skills.text:
If [Dive Bombing] sinks a a target, 100% chance for the target to explode after 1 second, dealing 150% of Saratoga's Firepower in damage to all enemies.
Can only proc once per battle.

skills.name: Supressive Shelling (制圧砲撃)
skills.text: During [Battle], the first time Saratoga enters within Long Range, 100% chance to activate [Carrier Salvo] on enemy Flagship, dealing 400% of Saratoga's Firepower in damage.

skills.name: Night Dancer (夜空の舞姫)
skills.text:
When entering a [Night Battle], Saratoga obtains a special [Airstrike] that deals 100% damage. 
If not used within 15 seconds, this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected.
Grants the ability to use [Opening Airstrike] during [Night Battle] if [Opening Airstrike] is unlocked.

skills.name: Airshow (大空の舞)
skills.text:
1. When [Airstrike] hits a target, if the number of ships alive on enemy fleet is equal or less than 4, obtains a [Special Airstrike] that deals 60% damage. 
If used or not used within 5 seconds, this skill is disabled for the rest of the battle. 
2. If either Enterprise or Hornet is present in the same battle, boost [Special Airstrike] damage by 10%. 
If both are present, boost by 20% instead.

skills.name: Careful Preparation (準備万端)
skills.text:
1. After ending a battle, boost damage by 5%, stacks up to 3 times. 
2. In map mode, a successful [Pre-emptive Airstrike] increases damage in next battle by 15%.

skills.name: Unyielding Willpower (不屈の意志)
skills.text:
1. During [Battle], if Medium or Heavy damaged, repairs 50% of Max HP over 3 seconds.
2. When Medium or Heavy damaged during [Day Battle], obtains a special [Airstrike] that deals 75% damage. If not used within 10 seconds, this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected. Can only activate once per battle

skills.name: Forward Airgroup (先鋒航空隊)
skills.text: 1. During map mode, increase damage of [Airstrike] by 50%.

skills.name: Independent Airgroup (独立航空隊)
skills.text:
1. During battle, if enemy fleet launches an [Airstrike] at own fleet, Hornet obtains a special [Airstrike] that deals 50% damage.
If used or not used within 15 seconds,  this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected. Can only proc 2 times per battle.

skills.name: Forward Bombing Party (先鋒爆撃隊)
skills.text: 1. If [Dive Bomber] hits, 100% to apply 2 stacks of [Fire], dealing 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.

skills.name: Know thyself, Know thy Enemy (己を知り敵を知る)
skills.text:
1. Increase Max HP by 20%.
2. During Map Mode, every Enemy Fleet located by a scout plane reduces [Fatigue] by 10% and increase all allies Speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Pre-emptive Airstrike - Inhibitor (先制空撃· 禁)
skills.text:
1. If [Airstrike] hits, inflicts [Inhibited] on the target, preventing the target from repairing for 20 seconds.
2. When attacking beyond Mid Range, Crit Rate increased by 25%.

skills.name: Ammunition Delivery (弾薬輸送)
skills.text: 1. When battle starts, increase Flagship's [Main Battery] damage by 20%.

skills.name: Airgroup Ambush(航空隊奇襲)
skills.text:
1. During battle, if [Airstrike] hits, every Bomber Squadron has a 100% chance to reduce target speed by 50% and disables their rudders, lasts 20 seconds. Does not stack.
2. Increase Crit Rate by 20%.

skills.name: Airgroup Pioneer (航空隊の先駆)
skills.text:
1. Increases damage of all Allied Carriers by 5%.
2. When entering Map Mode, all Allied Carriers gain 20 reserve planes on all slots.

skills.name: Aviations Support Team (航空支援隊)
skills.text:
1. During battle, if [Airstrike] hits, obtains a [Special Airstrike] that deals 40% damage. 
If used or not used within 15 seconds, this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected.
This [Special Airstrike] will flood the target, applying [Inhibited] for 20 seconds.
If Kaga is in the same Fleet, flood duration will refresh once.

skills.name: Precision Bombing - Akagi (精密爆撃 · 赤城)
skills.text:
1. During battle, prioritizes enemy Flagship.
2. The higher the enemy's HP, the more [Airstrike] damage Akagi deals, up to 20%.

skills.name: First Strike Doctrine- Offensive (先攻重視 · 攻)
skills.text:
1. In Map Mode, first [Pre-emptive Airstrike] deals 150% more damage. 100 seconds after entering a map, buff will be lost.
2. All Airgroups gain 20% more HP.

skills.name: Erosion Torpedoes - Air (破艇魚雷・空)
skills.text:
1. When [Torpedo Bomber] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Kaga's Firepower after [Flooding] ends.
If Akagi is in the same fleet, increases [Flooding] damage by 30%.

skills.name: Precision Bombing (精密爆撃)
skills.text:
1. During battle, prioritizes target with the highest current HP
2. The higher the enemy's HP, the more [Airstrike] damage Kaga deals, up to 20%.

skills.name: First Strike Doctrine - Defensive (先攻重視 · 守)
skills.text:
1. In Map Mode, first [Pre-emptive Airstrike] deals 150% more damage. 100 seconds after entering a map, buff will be lost.
2. Increases Max HP by 20%.

skills.name: Fast Re-arming (高速整備)
skills.text:
1. When launching an [Airstrike], Souryuu will obtain a special [Airstrike] that deals 40% damage.
If used or not used within 15 seconds, this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected. Cannot be used in Map Mode.

skills.name: First Strike Doctrine - Souryuu (先攻重視 · 蒼龍)
skills.text:
1. In Map Mode, first [Pre-emptive Airstrike] deals 150% more damage. 100 seconds after entering a map, buff will be lost.
2. Reduces all incoming damage taken by 10%.

skills.name: Pre-emptive Dive Bombing (先制爆撃)
skills.text:
1. If [Dive Bomber] hits, 100% to set 2 stacks of [Fire], dealing 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.
2. Prioritizes target with the highest current HP.

skills.name: First Strike Doctrine - Souryuu (先攻重視 · 飛龍)
skills.text:
1. In Map Mode, first [Pre-emptive Airstrike] deals 150% more damage. 100 seconds after entering a map, buff will be lost.
2. Reduces chance to be targeted by 90%.

skills.name: Erosion Torpedoes - Air (破艇魚雷・空)
skills.text:
1. When [Torpedo Bomber] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
2. After [Flooding] ends, target will take 140% of Shouhou's Firepower in damage.

skills.name: Flagship Defense Airgroup (旗艦直掩隊)
skills.text:
1. Increases Evasion by 10%.
2. During [Battle], if Allied Flagship receives damage, Shouhou will obtain a special [Airstrike] that deals 75% damage.
If used or not used within 15 seconds, this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected. Cannot be used in Map Mode.

skills.name: Carrier Killer (空母キラー)
skills.text: 1. Deals 50% more damage against Aircraft Carriers.

skills.name: Light Carrier Frame (軽空母の身軽さ)
skills.text:
1. Increases Evasion by 10%.
2. During Battle, if Allied Flagship receives damage, Zuihou will obtain a special [Airstrike] that deals 40% damage.
If used or not used within 15 seconds, this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected. Cannot be used in Map Mode.

skills.name: Royal Air Force (ロイヤルエアフォース)
skills.text:
1. Crit Rate increased by 20%.
2. If an [Airstrike] hits, for every Bomber Squadron that Ark Royal has equipped, there is a 100% chance to reduce enemy fleet's Speed by 50% and disables their rudders, lasts 20 seconds. Does not stack.

skills.name: Hawkeye (ホークアイ)
skills.text: 1. If an [Airstrike] hits, for every Bomber Squadron that Ark Royal has equipped, there is a 70% chance to increase the target's received damage by 5%, that lasts 30 seconds and can stack. Works with [Pre-emptive Airstrike].

skills.name: Reserve Squadrons (予備航空隊)
skills.text: 1. Increases aircraft reserves by 50.

skills.name: Erosion Torpedoes - Air (破艇魚雷・空)
skills.text:
1. When [Torpedo Bomber] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Courageous's Firepower.

skills.name: Inspiring Presence (鼓舞の心)
skills.text:
1. Increases [Airstrike] damage of the Flagship by 20%.
2. Increases own damage by 10%。

skills.name: Erosion Torpedoes - Air (破艇魚雷・空)
skills.text:
1. When [Torpedo Bomber] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Furious's Firepower.

skills.name: Precision Airstrike (精密空撃)
skills.text: 1. In Map Mode, after a successful [Pre-emptive Airstrike], increase damage by 6%. Stacks up to 30 times, lasts until leaving the Map.

skills.name: Full Salvo - Ultimate (火力全開 ·極)
skills.text:
1. During battle, inflict 125% of Firepower to all enemies 1 second after first [Main Battery Salvo].
2. If Warspite is in the same fleet, increases damage of QE's first [Main Battery Salvo] by 20%.

skills.name: Protection (援護)
skills.text:
1. If a friendly ship is under a [Main Battery] attack, and if Queen Elizabeth has at least 75% of her Max HP remaining, [Protection] can be activated:
Takes the incoming damage instead and reduces it by 80%. Can only proc 2 times in battle.

skills.name: Queenly Mindseet(女王の心境)
skills.text: 1. During an Allied [Main Battery Salvo], if an enemy ship has been sunk, increases Queen Elizabeth's damage by 6%, stacks up to 10 times in the same battle.

skills.name: Veteran Sniper (歴戦の射手)
skills.text:
1. If a [Main Battery Salvo] including Warspite sinks an enemy, reduces reload of next salvo by 6 seconds.
2. If Queen Elizabeth is in the same fleet, this skill is buffed by 1 extra second.

skills.name: All Out Attack (渾身の一撃)
skills.text:
1. During [Main Battery Salvo], increases chance of [Cut-in] by 20%.
2. The lower the enemy's HP, the more damage Warspite deals, up to 30%.

skills.name: Royal Eminence(王家の威厳)
skills.text:
1.Every time the fleet fires a [Main Batter Salvo], increases Warspite's [Main Battery Salvo]'s Critical Rate by 10%.
Can stack up to 5 times per battle.
2.When entering a battle, obtains a shield that can absorb damage equal to 20% of Warspite's Max HP

skills.name: Dawn of the Torpedo (鱼雷破晓)
skills.text:
1. Comes with 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge, can use [Torpedo Salvo] attacks.
2. [Torpedo Salvo] damage increased by 130%.
3. When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
After [Flooding] ends, target will take 140% of Scharnhorst's Firepower in damage.
4. Can fire [Torpedo Salvo] from Long Range.

skills.name: Undying Barrage (不灭的炮火)
skills.text:
Can fire [Main Battery Salvo] beyond Long Range.
[Main Battery Salvo] damage reduced by 20%.
When [Main Battery Salvo] hits, sets the target on [Fire]. [Fire] deals 330% of Firepower over 40 seconds.
If the target on [Fire] dies by [Fire], the effect is spread to a target with the lowest current HP, duration is carried over from the previous target.

skills.name: Main Battery Autoloader - Type Final (主炮缓冲终型)
skills.text: When in between Mid to Long Range, firing a [Torpedo Salvo] will reduce [Main Battery Salvo] CD by 15 seconds. Can only proc once per battle.

skills.name: Dawn of the Torpedo (鱼雷破晓)
skills.text:
1. Comes with 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge, can use [Torpedo Salvo] attacks.
2. [Torpedo Salvo] damage increased by 130%.
3. When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
After [Flooding] ends, target will take 140% of Gneisenau's Firepower in damage.
4. Can fire [Torpedo Salvo] from Long Range.

skills.name: High-Explosive Shell (榴弹灼烧)
skills.text:
[Main Battery Salvo] damage reduced by 20%.
If [Main Battery Salvo] hits, 100% to apply 2 stacks of [Fire], dealing 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.

skills.name: Main Battery Autoloader - Type Zero (主炮缓冲终型)
skills.text: When an enemy dies by [Fire], reduces [Main Battery Salvo] CD by 10 seconds, can only proc 2 times per battle.

skills.name: Lady's Fury (淑女の怒り)
skills.text: 1. After [Main Battery Salvo], 40% chance to set all enemies on [Fire], dealing 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.

skills.name: War Experience (歴戦の経験)
skills.text: 1. During battle, when an enemy ship is sunk by [Fire], 100% chance to reduce [Main Battery Salvo] reload time for all allies by 3 seconds. Can proc up to 5 times per battle.

skills.name: Lady's Dignity(淑女の矜持)
skills.text:
1. Increases Armour by 20%. 
2. When entering a battle, all alies obtains a barrier, equivalent to 20% of each ship Max HP, that absorbs [Torpedo Salvo] damage.

skills.name: Heavy Cruiser Killer (重巡キラー)
skills.text: 1. Prioritizes targeting Heavy Cruisers, deals 40% more damage against them.

skills.name: Clairvoyance (干里眼)
skills.text:
1. When not Medium or Heavily damged, increases Crit Rate by 25%.
2. During [Day Battle], reduces all incoming damage by 15%.

skills.name: Desperation Attack(火事場の馬鹿力)
skills.text:
1. Every time an enemy hits, reduces [Main Battery Salvo] cooldown by 6 seconds.
Can only proc 3 times per battle.

skills.name: All Out Attack (渾身の一撃)
skills.text: 1. The lower the enemy's HP, the more damage Repulse deals, up to 30%.

skills.name: Survivor's Will(生き残りの意地)
skills.text:
1. On [Main Battery hit] 50% chance to set enemies on [Fire]. [Fire] dealing 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.
2. On [Main Battery hit] 100% chance to inflict [Inhibited], preventing the target from repairing for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Oversized Main Battery (规格外の主炮)
skills.text:
1. Can fire [Main Battery] at Long Range.
2. Damage increased by 20%.

skills.name: Familiar Bearings (慣れた間合い)
skills.text: 1. During battle, when entering Medium Range, increases [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 30%, does not stack, lasts for 15 seconds.

skills.name: Extra Firepower (火力補正)
skills.text: 1. If [Main Battery Salvo] sinks a target, increases Chicago's next [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 150%. Can only proc 3 times per battle.

skills.name: Thirst for Battle (激戦への渇求)
skills.text:
1. Prioritizes target with the highest current HP.
2. On [Secondary Battery Activation], [Main Battery] damage increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Secondary Surprise (副砲の意外性)
skills.text: 1. Damage of the first [Secondary Battery Salvo] of the battle will be increased by 400%.

skills.name: Thirst for Battle (激戦への渇求)
skills.text:
1. Prioritizes target with the highest current HP.
2. On [Secondary Battery Activation], [Main Battery] damage increased by 50% for 10 seconds

skills.name: Fire Control Expert (砲撃専門家)
skills.text:
1. During battle, when the Allied Fleet launches a [Torpedo Salvo], increases Indianapolis' next [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 100%, lasts 10 seconds.
Can only proc 3 times per battle.

skills.name: Secondary Expert (副炮手)
skills.text: 1. During Battle, damage of the first 2 [Secondary Battery Salvo] will be increased by 200%.

skills.name: Full Armament (完武装)
skills.text:
1. On the first[Secondary Battery Salvo], increase Allied Fleet Crit Rate by 30% for 7 seconds, buff is lost after any attack is launched.
Effect is doubled if activated in Close Range, but damage taken by Allied Fleet is increased by 15%.

skills.name: Oversized Main Battery (规格外の主炮)
skills.text:
1. Can fire [Main Battery] at Long Range.
2. Increase damage by 20%.

skills.name: Wrath (激怒)
skills.text:
1. When in any damaged state, all offensive capabilities stay fully operational.
2. If in a T-Advantage Engagement, Crit Rate of [Main Battery] increased by 50%
Else, if in a Parallel or Head-on Engagement, Crit Rate of [Main Battery] increased by 25%

skills.name: Artillery Support (强袭支援)
skills.text:
1.During battle when entering Medium Range from Long Range, cue Guadalcanal immediately deals 225% of her Firepower in damage against enemy with the highest HP.
Can only proc 2 times per battle.

skills.name: Torpedo Mastery (雷撃の極み)
skills.text:
1. During battle, the first time Haguro enters Close Range, reduce Firepower by 90% while [Torpedo Salvo] damage is increased by 20%
Gains 1 extra [Torpedo Salvo] charge immediately and every 10 seconds thereafter. Last until the end of battle.

skills.name: Battle Stance (臨戦態勢)
skills.text: 1. At the start of a battle, [Main Battery] damage increased by 50%. Buff is lost when entering Close Range.

skills.name: Fighting Spirit (闘魂)
skills.text: 1. At the start of a battle, increases Crit Rate by 10%. Aterwards, increase Crit Rate by another 10% every 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 10 times.

skills.name: Chase (チェイス）
skills.text:
1. [On Main Battery Salvo], prioritizes target with the lowest current HP.
2. If a ship sinks during salvo, 100% chance to reload own [Main Battery].
3. If Dorsetshire is in the same battle, increases all of Norfolk's damage by 12%.

skills.name: Salvo Warning (着弾警戒·剛)
skills.text:
1. Increases Armour by 20%.
2. Increases Crit Rate of Allied Fleet [Main Battery Salvo] if Norfolk participates in it by 10%.

skills.name: Chase (チェイス）
skills.text:
1. [On Main Battery Salvo], prioritizes target with the lowest current HP.
2. If a ship sinks during salvo, 100% chance to reload own [Main Battery]
3. If Norfolk is in the same battle, increases all of Dorsetshire's damage by 12%.

skills.name: Torpedo Warning (着弾警戒·柔)
skills.text:
1. Reduces incoming [Torpedo Salvo] damage by 20%.
2. Increases Crit Rate of Allied Fleet [Main Battery Salvo] if Dorsetshire participates in it by 10%.

skills.name: Veteran Fighter (百戦練磨)
skills.text:
1. If a friendly ship is hit by a [Torpedo Salvo], and if Blücher has at least 75% of her Max HP remaining: change all torpedo's target to Blucher:
Blucher takes all torpedo damage during that salvo. Can only proc once per battle.
2. When in any damaged state, Crit Rate increased by 25%.
3. When in any damaged state, all offensive capabilities stay fully operational.

skills.name: Ammo Gift (火器御礼)
skills.text:
1. Reduces incoming [Torpedo Salvo] damage by 20%.
2. When entering a battle, obtains a shield with 20% of Max HP that absorbs [Torpedo Salvo] damage.
3. Whenever Blucher is Heavily Damaged, a random ally that can arm torpedo will have a 100% chance of getting 1 additional torpedo. Proc up to 3 times per battle.

skills.name: Bullet Hell (弾幕)
skills.text:
1. [On Main Battery Salvo], prioritizes target with the lowest current HP.
2. If a ship is sunk during a [Main Battery Salvo] that involves Prinz Eugen, instantly reloads [Main Battery].
3. Crit Rate increased by 25% if in Mid range.

skills.name: Resurgence (逆境)
skills.text:
1. [On Main Battery Salvo] if attacking with [T-Disadvantage], 100% to disregard damage debuff.
2. If a ship is sunk during a [Main Battery Salvo] that doesn't involve Prinz Eugen, increase damage by 25% until the end of this battle.

skills.name: Arrogance (傲慢の寛大)
skills.text:
1. Reduces incoming damage by 20%.
2. When the Fleet is sailing at Full Speed, fatigue buildup is reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Combat Awareness (危険探知)
skills.text: 1. During battle, if attacking with T-Disadvantage, all allies have a 100% to ignore damage debuff.

skills.name: 1. Undamaged Cannon (無損砲甲)
skills.text: When not in any damaged state, increase damage by 25%.

skills.name: Destroyer Killer (駆逐艦キラー)
skills.text: 1. Prioritizes targeting Destroyers, [Main Battery] damage done to Destroyers increased by 40%.

skills.name: Special Torpedoes (特種魚雷)
skills.text: 1. Damage of the Flagship's first [Torpedo Salvo] deals 75% more damage.

skills.name: Undefeated (百戦百勝)
skills.text:
1. When entering a battle, add a stack of 5% increased Crit Rate. Adds 1 stack every 10 seconds after, up to 10 times.
2. On [Main Battery hit] 50% chance to set enemies on [Fire]. [Fire] deals 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.
3. On [Main Battery miss], following salvo reload reduced by 50%

skills.name: Elegant and Indestructible (優雅不破)
skills.text:
1. Increases armour by 20%. 
2. Increase all allied ships' AA stat by 30%.
3. Sailing at Flank Speed increases Oakland's damage by 15%.

skills.name: Blazing Barrage (烈火砲撃)
skills.text: 1. On [Main Battery hit], 75% chance to set enemies on [Fire]. [Fire] DoT deals 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.

skills.name: Charged Barrage (蓄力砲撃)
skills.text:
1.When entering a battle, add a stack of 10% increased Crit Rate. Adds 1 stack every 10 seconds after, up to 10 times.
On [Main Battery miss],  reduce Cleveland's reload time for the next shot by 50%

skills.name: Counter-attack Stance (反転態勢)
skills.text:
1. Increases armour by 20%. 
2. Increase all allied ships' AA stat by 30%.
3. During battle, if enemy fleet launches an air attack, increases Cleveland's damage by 25%.

skills.name: Spirit of Torpedo Squadron 3 (三水戦の魂)
skills.text:
1. When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50% for 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Sendai's Firepower after [Flooding] ends.
2. If Jintsuu is in the same battle, increases all of Sendai's damage by 20%.

skills.name: High Speed Penetration (高速突貫)
skills.text:
1. During battle, everytime the fleet enters Close Range, reduces Fatigue by 10% and increases Sendai's damage by 10% for 10 seconds.
Effect does not stack, can be refreshed.

skills.name: Flower of Torpedo Squadron 2 (二水戦の華)
skills.text:
1. When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Jintsuu's Firepower after [Flooding] ends.
2. If Sendai is in the same battle, increases all of Jintsuu's damage by 20%.

skills.name: Bounce Back (奮起)
skills.text: 1. During battle, if a target is sunk by an attack that Jintsuu participate in, reduces Fatigue by 20% and increases Jintsuu's damage by 15% for 15 seconds.

skills.name: Erosion Torpedoes (破艇魚雷)
skills.text:
1. When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds. 
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Tenryuu's Firepower after [Flooding] ends

skills.name: Operations Replenishment (戦時燃料)
skills.text:
1. Increases Allied Fleet [Flooding] damage by 25% and reduces Allied Fleet Crit Rate by 5%.
2. In Map Mode, picking up Fatigue reducing items will reduce Fatigue even further.

skills.name: Torpedo Reserves (魚雷備蓄)
skills.text: 1. When a [Torpedo Salvo] hits and sinks an enemy, 100% to gain 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge and increases next [Torpedo Salvo] damage by 30%. Can only proc once per battle.

skills.name: Torpedo Delivery (魚雷输送)
skills.text: 1. Increases Flagship's [Torpedo Salvo] damage by 20%.

skills.name: Textbook Tactics (戦術の手本)
skills.text:
1. If in a T-Advantage Engagement, Crit Rate of [Main Battery] increased by 50%. If in a Parallel or Head-on Engagement, Crit Rate of [Main Battery] increased by 25%.
2. When [Main Battery Salvo] hits, 100% to inflict [Inhibited], preventing the target from repairing for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Guardian (護衛の極意)
skills.text:
1. Increases Flagship's Crit Rate by 20%.
2. After a battle ends, repairs Flagship by 20% of the Flagship's Max HP.

skills.name: High-Explosive Battery (炎上砲撃)
skills.text: 1. On [Main Battery Salvo] hit, 50% chance to set enemies on [Fire], dealing 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.

skills.name: Anti-Air Ship(対空防衛艦)
skills.text:
1. Increases Allied Fleet [Fire] damage by 25%. and reduces Allied Fleet Crit Rate by 5%.
2. When entering a battle, provides the Flagship a shield with 20% of the Flagship's Max HP that absorbs [Airstrike] damage.

skills.name: Special Torpedoes (特殊魚雷)
skills.text: 1. When entering a battle, gains 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge, 40% chance to gain a further 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge.

skills.name: Ammunition Delivery (弾薬輸送)
skills.text: 1. When battle starts, increase Flagship's [Main Battery] damage by 20%.

skills.name: Torpedo Expert (魚雷の名人)
skills.text: 1. When entering a battle, 100% chance to gain 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge.

skills.name: Spearhead (一番槍)
skills.text: 1. For the first 10 seconds of a Day or Night battle, increase damage dealt by 40%.

skills.name: Torpedo Reserves (予備魚雷)
skills.text: 1. [On Torpedo Salvo], 30% chance to immediately reload 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge, can only proc 3 times per battle.

skills.name: Phantom Fleet (幻影艦隊)
skills.text:
1. During a Day Battle, the enemy fleet will not attempt to attack the fleet Craven is in for 5 seconds, unless a [Torpedo Salvo] hits or [Main Battery Salvo] is fired.
2. When battle starts, increases Allied Fleet Crit Rate by 15%. Every 5s thereafter, reduce the effect of this buff by 5% till 0%.

skills.name: Torpedo Expert (魚雷の名人)
skills.text: 1. When entering a battle, 100% chance to gain 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge.

skills.name: Nightstalker (闇夜の潜伏者)
skills.text:
1. During a Night Battle, the enemy fleet will not attempt to attack the fleet McCall is in for 5 seconds, unless a [Torpedo Salvo] hits or [Main Battery Salvo] is fired.
2. When battle starts, increases Allied Fleet [Torpedo Salvo] damage by 12%. Every 5s thereafter, this buff is weakened by 4% till 0%.

skills.name: Torpedo Expert (魚雷の名人)
skills.text: 1. When entering a battle, 100% chance to gain 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge.

skills.name: Taking a breather (束の間の休憩)
skills.text:
1. Increases Stamina Recovery by 50% when at First Speed.
2. When battle starts, increases Allied Fleet speed by 30%. Every 5s thereafter, this buff is weakened by 10% till 0%.
Buff will also disappear if an enemy fleet [Main Battery Salvo] circle fills up or lands a [Torpedo Salvo].

skills.name: Special Torpedoes (特殊魚雷)
skills.text: 1. When entering a battle, gains 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge, 40% chance to gain a further 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge

skills.name: Combat Awareness (危険探知)
skills.text:
1.Can use [Main Battery Salvo] at Medium range.
2. During battle, when entering an enemy [Main Battery Salvo] or [Airstrike] circle, increases Fubuki's [Main Battery Salvo] Damage by 15%, stacks up to 10 times.

skills.name: Cardiotonic (強心剤)
skills.text:
1. Increases Max HP by 20%.
2. When entering Medium Range, increases Fleet Speed by 100% for 1 second.

skills.name: Torpedo Reserves (予備魚雷)
skills.text: 1. [On Torpedo Salvo], 30% chance to immediately reload 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge, can only proc 3 times per battle.

skills.name: Surprise Salvo (奇襲砲撃)
skills.text: 1. [On Torpedo Salvo], increases Yuudachi's next [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 220%

skills.name: Ambush (待ち伏せ)
skills.text:
1. Increases HP by 20%
2. Forces the fleet to spawn in Mid Range.

skills.name: Ramming Speed (捨て身の体当たり)
skills.text: 1. During battle, ramming an enemy fleet will deal 180% of Glowworm's Firepower. Can only proc 3 times per battle, 5 seconds CD.

skills.name: Disruptor (番狂わせ)
skills.text: 1. During battle when entering within Close Range, 100% to disrupt enemy [Main Battery] targeting circles and disables it for 3 seconds. Can only proc once per battle.

skills.name: Erosion Torpedoes - Offensive (破艇魚雷．傷)
skills.text:
1. When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Z1's Firepower after [Flooding] ends.
2. Prioritizes target with the highest current HP.

skills.name: First of the Z-Series (Z型筆頭)
skills.text:
1. When the Fleet is sailing at Full Speed, fatigue buildup is reduced by 50%.
2. During battle, if an enemy is sunk by [Flooding] damage, 100% chance to reload a [Torpedo Salvo] charge on a random Allied ship capable of arming torpedo.

skills.name: Night Battle Elite (夜戦上手)
skills.text: 1. During a Night Battle, increases Crit Rate by 40%.

skills.name: Supplemental Nourishments (栄養剤)
skills.text:
1. Increases Max HP by 20%.
2. When Night Battle starts, repair ally with the lowest HP by 50% of Z16's max HP.

skills.name: Battleship Killer (戦艦キラー)
skills.text: 1. Prioritizes targeting Battleships or Battlecruisers, deals 40% more damage against them.

skills.name: Torpedo Delivery (魚雷輸送)
skills.text: 1. Increases Flagship's [Torpedo Salvo] damage by 20%.

skills.name: Counterattack of the Mook (端役の逆襲)
skills.text:
1. Reduces chance to be targeted by 90%.
2. During battle, if Foch has not taken any damage, increases damage by 30%.

skills.name: Special Air Orders (特殊航空指令)
skills.text: 1. At the start of [Battle], increases flagship's [Opening Airstrike] and the first [Airstrike] damage by 75%.

skills.name: Fire All Cannon! (全砲門開け！)
skills.text: 1. During battle, inflict 125% of Firepower to all enemies after first [Main Battery Salvo]

skills.name: Ambush (待ち伏せ)
skills.text:
1. Increases HP by 20%
2. Forces the fleet to spawn in Mid Range

skills.name: Fire All Cannon! (全砲門開け！)
skills.text: 1. During battle, inflict 125% of Firepower to all enemies after first [Main Battery Salvo]

skills.name: Fast Reload (高速装填)
skills.text: 1. During battle, every time a [Main Battery Salvo] is fired, reduces Arizona's [Main Battery] CD by 1.5 seconds. Can proc up to 15 times per battle.

skills.name: High-Explosive Battery (炎上砲撃)
skills.text: 1. On [Main Battery Salvo] hit, 100% chance to apply 1 stack of [Fire] and 50% chance to apply another stack of [Fire]. Each stack of [Fire] deals 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.

skills.name: Tactical Cover (戦術援護)
skills.text:
1. On [Secondary Battery Activation], increases the fleet's [Anti-Torp] by 70%, for 3 seconds.
2. When Battle is over, repairs 30% HP of the lowest HP Allied ship in the fleet.

skills.name: Thirst for Battle (激戦への渇求)
skills.text:
1. Prioritizes target with the highest current HP.
2. On [Secondary Battery Activation], increases [Main Battery] damage by 50% for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Torpedo Interceptor (魚雷邀撃者)
skills.text:
1. If a friendly ship is hit by a [Torpedo Salvo], and if Maryland has at least 75% of her Max HP remaining, activate this skill: 
Maryland takes all torpedo damage during that salvo. Can only proc once per battle.
2. At the end of [Battle], repair 50% of self HP.

skills.name: Valiance - Counterattack (覚悟・反撃敢行)
skills.text:
1. Increases Crit Rate by 20%.
2. If a friendly ship is hit by a [Main Battery Salvo], and if WV has at least 75% of her Max HP remaining, activate this skill.
Forces all enemies to target WV instead, can only proc 2 times per battle.

skills.name: Incoming Fire Alert (砲撃警戒体勢)
skills.text:
1. When entering a battle, obtains a shield that's equivalent to 20% of Max HP that absorbs [Main Battery] damage.
2. When WV drops to Heavy Damage, increases Allied Fleet Crit Rate by 20%. Effect does not stack, can proc 2 times per battle.

skills.name: Vital Parts Shelling (急所攻撃)
skills.text:
1. When [Main Battery Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to lower target speed by 50% and disables the rudder. Lasts 10 seconds, does not stack.
2. Increases Crit Rate by 20%

skills.name: Aim Assist (標準補正)
skills.text: 1. During Battle, 40% to use T-Cross Advantage buff during [Main Battery Salvo]

skills.name: Swift and Decisive (速戦即決)
skills.text: 1. During battle, every [Torpedo Salvo] launched by Fantasque will increase her [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 50%. Effect stacks, lasts till end of battle.

skills.name: Combat Awareness (危険探知)
skills.text:
1.Can use [Main Battery Salvo] at Medium range.
2. During battle, when entering an enemy [Main Battery Salvo] or [Airstrike] circle, increases Fantasque's [Main Battery Salvo] Damage by 15%, stacks up to 10 times.

skills.name: Fire Support(火力支援)
skills.text: 1. Every [Main Battery Salvo] has a 70% chance to debuff a target, increasing its damage received by 3%. Stacks up to 5 times on every enemy vessel.

skills.name: Erosion Torpedoes - Offensive (破艇魚雷．傷)
skills.text:
1. When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Artigliere's Firepower after [Flooding] ends.
2. Prioritizes target with the highest current HP.

skills.name: Pre-emptive Strike - Small Ship (先手必勝 · 小型艦)
skills.text:
1. Can use [Main Battery Salvo] at Medium range.
2. Crit Rate increased by 40% during Night Battle.

skills.name: Unyielding Lineage (不屈の伝承者)
skills.text:
1. When taking damage, only receive 25% of damage done. 75% of the remaining damage will be split and received after 10 seconds, 20 seconds and 30 seconds.
2. Max HP increased by 20%.

skills.name: Lock-on Cannon (ロックオン砲)
skills.text:
1. [On Main Battery Salvo], prioritizes target with the lowest current HP.
2. If a ship sinks during [Main Battery Salvo], 100% chance to reduce [Main Battery] Reload on all ships in fleet by 3 seconds. Can only proc 5 times per battle.

skills.name: Competitive (凶戦の意志)
skills.text: 1. During Day Battle, for every ally Battlecruiser excluding self, reduces Alaska's [Main Battery] Reload by 1 second.

skills.name: Gargantua Pressure (超越者の威圧)
skills.text: 1. During battle, damage dealt towards Heavy Cruisers, Light Cruisers and Destroyers is increased by 30%.

skills.name: Erosion Torpedoes - Offensive (破艇魚雷．傷)
skills.text:
1. When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Hatsuharu's Firepower after [Flooding] ends.

skills.name: Shout of Vigor (活力雄叫)
skills.text:
1. When entering a night battle, reduces Fatigue by 20%.
2. When firing [Main Battery Salvo], any Allied ship with less than 3 seconds on their reload will reload immediately, can proc 6 times per battle.

skills.name: Reserve Air Wing (JP Placeholder)
skills.text:
1. Can equip 2 Torpedo Bomber groups.
2. Upon entering a map, increases Torpedo Bomber reserves by 150.

skills.name: Swordfish Attack (JP Placeholder)
skills.text:
1 .When [Torpedo Bomber] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
1. After [Flooding] ends, target will take 140% of Illustrious' Firepower in damage.

skills.name: Nightmare of Taranto (タラントの悪夢)
skills.text: In Map Mode, first [Pre-emptive Airstrike] deals 200% more damage. 100 seconds after entering a map, buff will be lost.

skills.name: Radar Probing (レーダー探知)
skills.text:
1. Prioritizes target with the highest current HP.
2. The higher the enemy's HP, the more damage Helena deals, up to 20%.

skills.name: Wrath (激怒)
skills.text:
1. When in any damaged state, all offensive capabilities stay fully operational.
2. If in a T-Advantage Engagement, Crit Rate of [Main Battery] increased by 50%
Else, if in a Parallel or Head-on Engagement, Crit Rate of [Main Battery] increased by 25%

skills.name: Battle Orchestrator (悪戦調律)
skills.text:
1. During Battle, obtains a shield with 50% of Max HP that absorbs [Airstrike] damage.
2. Allied Fleet's Crit Rate of the first [Main Battery Salvo] is increased by 30%. 
If Helena is set as Flagship, Allied Fleet's first [Main Battery Salvo] can be fired from Long Range.

skills.name: Fierce Shelling (熾烈放火)
skills.text:
1. When entering a battle, add a stack of 5% increased Crit Rate. Adds 1 stack every 10 seconds after, up to 10 times. 
2. During a [Main Battery salvo], if an enemy is sunk, immediately repairs North Carolina by 20% of Max HP and increases damage of next [Main Battery Salvo] by 30%.

skills.name: Protect (援護)
skills.text:
1. If a friendly ship is under a [Main Battery] attack, and if North Carolina has at least 75% of her Max HP remaining, activate this skill. 
Takes the incoming damage instead and reduces it by 80%. Can only proc 2 times per battle.

skills.name: Air Cover (航空直掩隊)
skills.text: 1. During battle, after an [Airstrike] has been launched, 100% chance to reduce North Carolina's [Main Battery] CD by 10 seconds. Can only proc 3 times per battle.

skills.name: High-Explosive Battery (燃烧炮击)
skills.text: 1. On [Main Battery Salvo] hit, 100% chance to apply 1 stack of [Fire] and 50% chance to apply another stack of [Fire]. Each stack of [Fire] deals 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.

skills.name: Incoming Torpedo Alert (鱼雷预警)
skills.text:
Reduces all incoming damage by 10%.
When entering a battle, obtains a shield with 20% of Max HP that absorbs [Torpedo Salvo] damage.

skills.name: Ace Up The Sleeve (隐藏雷仓)
skills.text: 1. During battle, everytime Saumarez passes by the Close Range radius, 100% chance to gain 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge. Can only proc 2 times per battle.

skills.name: All Out Attack (渾身の一撃)
skills.text:
1. During [Main Battery Salvo], increases chance of [Cut-in] by 20%.
2. [Cut-in] damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Lethal Torpedo (致命の魚雷)
skills.text: 1. When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 70% to inflict a stacking debuff that increases all damage taken by target by 5%.

skills.name: Torpedo Scatter (爆散魚雷)
skills.text:
1. When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
After [Flooding] ends, target will take 140% of Sam's Firepower in damage.
2. Prioritizes target with the highest current HP.

skills.name: Raining Torpedoes (天降鱼雷)
skills.text: 1. During battle, if an [Airstrike] hits, increases Sam's Evasion by 30% for 7 seconds. Afterwards, 70% chance to gain 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge, can only gain charges twice per battle.

skills.name: Valiance - Counterattack (覚悟・反撃敢行)
skills.text:
1. If a friendly ship is hit by a [Main Battery Salvo], and if Sam has at least 75% of her Max HP remaining, activate this skill:
Forces all enemies to target Sam instead, can only proc 2 times per battle.
2. Increases HP by 20%.

skills.name: Escort Ship (护航使者)
skills.text: 1. During battle, the first enemy attack of type (Main Battery, Airstrike, Torpedo) has a 100% chance to instantly reload 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge.

skills.name: Relentless Bombardment (奋进炮击)
skills.text:
1. During [Main Battery Salvo], increases chance of [Cut-in] by 20%.
2. [Cut-in] damage increased by 50%.

skills.name: Marked by Torpedo (鱼雷烙印)
skills.text:
During battle, Savage's [Torpedo Salvo] will prioritse target with the highest current HP.
On [Torpedo Salvo] hit, the target will be marked. The next [Main Battery Salvo] of the fleet will be 90% more likely to hit the same target.

skills.name: Deterrent Shelling (威嚇射撃)
skills.text:
1. When [Main Batter Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Alabama's Firepower after [Flooding] ends.

skills.name: Continuous Fire (波状攻撃)
skills.text:
1. Can equip up to 3 AA mount.
During battle, [Main Battery Salvo] damage is increased by 15% of Alabama's AA and equipment AA stats.

skills.name: Counterattack Signal (反撃の狼煙)
skills.text:
1. All offensive capabilities of the Flagship stays fully operational regardless of her damaged state.
2. During battle, every time the Allied Fleet is hit by an enemy attack, increases Alabama's [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 10%.
Stacks up to 3 times, lasts till the battle ends, 5s CD between stacking of the buff.

skills.name: Untrackable Silhouette (纏わない姿)
skills.text:
1. During battle, every time the enemy fleet prepares a [Main Battery Salvo], Volta's Speed increases by 100% and reduces damage taken by 50%, lasts 3 seconds.
This skill has a 5s CD, can only proc 6 times per battle.

skills.name: Revolutionary Modification (常識を覆す改良)
skills.text:
1. Can equip up to 3 Main Battery.
2. During battle, [Shelling] is increased by 15% of Volta's [Shelling] and equipment [Shelling] stats.

skills.name: Mastercraft Ship (匠の傑作)
skills.text:
1. During battle, increases Crit Rate of first 2 [Main Battery Salvo] by 100%, will use the T-Adv damage modifier regardless of engagement type.
If a ship is sunk during these 2 salvo, instantly reloads [Main Battery].

skills.name: Power Unleased (制限された力)
skills.text: 1. During battle, every time an enemy ship is sunk, increases damage of Algerie's next [Main Battery Salvo] by 50%, effect stacks until battle is over.

skills.name: Secondary Surprise (副砲の意外性)
skills.text: 1. Damage of the first [Secondary Battery Salvo] of the battle will be increased by 400%.

skills.name: Unquenchable Fury (拭いきれぬ念)
skills.text: 1. During battle, every time an enemy is hit by a friendly attack, reduce its damage by 5% for 10s, stacks up to 16 times.

skills.name: Inherited Name (継承する名)
skills.text:
1. After firing a [Torpedo Salvo], increases all enemies damage received by 3% for 10 seconds.
2. After [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, if a ship is sunk within 10 seconds, 100% chance to add an additional [Torpedo Charge] to self.
Can only proc once per battle

skills.name: Raising Firepower (加算し続ける)
skills.text: 1. During battle, increases self's [Main Battery] damage by 2% every second up to a maximum of 30 times.

skills.name: Double-bladed Sharpness (二刀流の切れ味)
skills.text:
1. When [Main Battery] hits, randomly choose between AP-shell or HE-shell. If fired after a [Torpedo Salvo], use both shells.
AP-shell: [Main Battery] damage increases by 20%.
HE-shell: When [Main Battery] hit, 100% chance to set target on [Fire]. [Fire] deals 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.

skills.name: Pride of the Fleet (旗の意地)
skills.text:
1. If Jervis is set as the Flagship, increase the Speed of all aliied Destroyers by 10%.
2. When battle starts, gains 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge. 20% chance to gain an additional charge, +20% for every additional DD in same fleet.

skills.name: Rebellious Charter (反律の掟)
skills.text:
1. During the start of a Day/Night battle, Jervis gains an "Umbrella" charge, then 1 additional every 10s.
2. If the number of "Umbrella" is above 1, firing a [Torpedo Salvo] consumes 1 charge and increases Jervis' [Torpedo Salvo] Damage by 40%.

skills.name: Ultimate Umbrella (天下の傘)
skills.text: If the number of "Umbrella" is above 1, 100% chance to consume all "Umbrella" charges to let Jervis avoid a single attack.

skills.name: Hazy Moon (覇月の朧)
skills.text:
1. On [Main Battery Salvo], all allies gain "Hazuki". On [Secondary Battery Salvo], all allies gain "Oborotsuki". 
2. Every time Takao gains either ”Hazuki", "Oborotsuki" or "Mugetsu", increases damage by 10%.

skills.name: Extermination - Violence (鏖殺・破勢)
skills.text:
1. When Takao has both "Hazuki" and "Oborotsuki", reloads [Main Battery] immediately. Afterwards, remove both "Hazuki" and "Oborotsuki".
2. When Takao has all 3 "Hazuki", "Oborotsuki" and "Mugetsu", deals 100% of Takao's Firepower to the lowest health enemy. Afterwards, removes all 3 effects.

skills.name: Full Moon (満ちる月)
skills.text: On [Main Battery Salvo], increases [Main Battery] damage by 6%. Stacks indefinitely and lasts until the end of battle.

skills.name: New Moon (月下の無)
skills.text:
1. On [Torpedo Salvo] all allies gain "Mugestu". On [Secondary Battery Salvo], all allies gain "Oborotsuki"
2. Every time Atago gains either ”Hazuki", "Oborotsuki" or "Mugetsu", increases damage by 10%.

skills.name: Extermination - Chaos (鏖殺・乱勢)
skills.text:
1. When Atago has both "Mugestu" and "Oborotsuki", immediately add an additional [Torpedo Salvo] charge. Afterwards, remove both "Mugetsu" and "Oborotsuki".
2. When Atago has all 3 "Hazuki", "Oborotsuki" and "Mugetsu", deals 100% of Atago Firepower to the lowest health enemy. Afterwards, removes all 3 effects.

skills.name: Broken Moon (壊れた月)
skills.text: Atago's [Torpedo Salvo] Damage and Crit Chance increased by 30% and 100% respectively.

skills.name: Crane's Voice (鶴の一声)
skills.text:
1. During Battle, for the first 2 [Airstrike], if an Airstrike sinks an enemy ship, Zuikaku obtains a special [Airstrike] that deals 50% damage. 
If not used within 15 seconds, this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected.
If the first 2 [Airstrike] doesn't sink an enemy ship, the next [Airstrike] will deal 50% more damage.

skills.name: Heat Haze (陽炎)
skills.text: After [Airstrike], inflicts a debuff on an enemy with the lowest current HP. Debuff increases received firepower-based damage by 50%. When debuff expires, deals an additional 100% of Zuikaku's Firepower as damage.

skills.name: Moon Crane (夜間の月鶴)
skills.text:
1. 90% less chance to be targeted.
2. Can [Airstrike] during Night Battle. If [Opening Airstrike] is unlocked, then gain the ability to do so for battle that starts at Night.
